title: Bug 6656: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
description: The close button in the Navigator view moves down when the view is resized smaller on Linux, running build 20011127 (this issue does not occur on build 20011116 on Nt2000).
OB: The close button moves below the label in the Navigator view when the view is resized smaller on Linux.
EB: The close button should stay aligned with the label and not move down when the Navigator view is resized smaller on Linux.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the Navigator view.
2. Resize the view to make it smaller.
3. Observe that the close button moves below the label in the Navigator view.
